document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Why </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">shut </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">out </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Heaven? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">sing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">loud? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">say </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">"minor" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Timid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Bird! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would'nt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Angels </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">try </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">troubled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">dont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">shut </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">door! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Gentleman </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">"White </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Robe" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Hand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">knocked </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">forbid? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Why do they shut me out of heaven?
